author: Stephen King
description: Recipe supplied by Patrón, who say that Stephen was inspired by the Italian flavours of Boston’s North End neighbourhood, reflected in his recipe with savoury thyme and cherry tomato.
name: North End Margarita

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE tomato in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with and fine strain into chilled rimmed glass

video.name: HOWTO make North End Margarita
